game.name: DCS: AH-64D The Four Horsemen Campaign by Fight's On Sims
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Downloadable Content, Tracked Controller Support, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: In 2014, the militant group Islamic State made vast territorial gains in Iraq and Syria following several offensives. It is claimed its territory was captured by a caliphate, within which it enforced a strict interpretation of Sharia.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In 2014, the militant group Islamic State made vast territorial gains in Iraq and Syria following several offensives. It is claimed its territory was captured by a caliphate, within which it enforced a strict interpretation of Sharia.
game.developers: Eagle Dynamics SA, Fight's On Sims
